text: Roseanne will be returning to ABC for a second season after the first season of the reboot was a spectacular success. The second season of Roseanne is set to feature cast - members Roseanne Barr, John Goodman, Laurie Metcalf, Sara Gilbert, Alicia Goranson and Michael Fishman once again. Additional cameos will be made by past cast - members every so often. There is no word on whether or not the season will air by fall, but according to The Hollywood Reporter, the season order has reportedly been increased from nine episodes to 13.
